content: this pdf is 29 pages long and is a 3-in-1 pdf for the moss stitch squares pattern the moss stitch join-as-you-go joining method and the moss stitch border pattern it includes a photo heavy version of all three of the patterns on pages 1-25 it also includes just the written pattern on pages 26-29 with only two photos for those who do not want lots of photos to print out the pattern includes links to two video tutorials which support the moss stitch square pattern and the join-as-you-go technique all three patterns are available free on my website
